example.text: House Republicans continued their race to criminalize abortion nationwide, passing two harmful bills that would put women in danger, punish health care providers, and spread lies about abortion care. I proudly joined House Democrats as we stood united against these MAGA bills.

In 2021, I introduced a bill to award Mr. Ferencz with the Congressional Gold Medal, the highest expression of Congressional appreciation for distinguished achievements and contributions. With overwhelming bipartisan support, that effort became part of major legislation signed by President Biden.

Great news! Florida's funding from the [[user]]'s Regional Innovation Engines Development Awards will help coordinate support for small business suppliers adopting additive manufacturing & advanced technologies. Congratulations to the winners. [[url]]

On International Day Against Homophobia, Biphobia, & Transphobia, [[user]] signed his "slate of hate" into law— an extreme attack on LGBTQ people's personal freedom. Everyone deserves to live freely as their authentic selves—in Florida & across the world. [[url]]

The state tried to reject 81% of social studies materials and then only accepted some of them after forcing the publishers to censor mentions of "social justice" or other topics deemed "inappropriate".

Palestinian Islamic Jihad in Gaza has fired hundreds of rockets at Israeli civilians. I condemn these acts of terror & am grateful that the Iron Dome is there to save lives. We must continue to support the Iron Dome & Israel's security. [[url]]
House Democrats are fighting back, and we will continue to defend reproductive freedom. And we look to the Democratic majority in the Senate to keep anti-abortion legislation off the table.
